attributes.action: Direct Parliment to repeal the 1707 Act of Union between the Kingdoms of Scotland and England with immediate effect.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 1707 Act of Union between Scotland & England was enacted with no regard given whatsoever to the wishes of the Scottish people.  It has outlived its purpose and should be repealed immediately, and the Scottish public be given the chance to decide for themselves the future of Scotland.
